Key Match Events: Fakhar Zaman and Abdullah Shafique put on 128 for the opening stand
Fakhar Zaman scored 81 off 74 balls with seven sixes and three fours
Abdullah Shafique scored 68 off 69 balls with two sixes and nine fours
Shaheen Shah Afridi and Haris Rauf dismissed the Bangladesh top order
Mehidy Hasan Miraz took three wickets
Wasim took the last three wickets to bowl Bangladesh out for 204
Pre-Game Insights: Pakistan have won six out of seven matches at Eden Gardens
Pakistan's only defeat at Eden Gardens came against Sri Lanka in 1997
Fakhar Zaman returns to the side and scores a half-century
Abdullah Shafique scores his third half-century in the World Cup
Pakistan need to improve their batting power and aggression
Bangladesh's highest partnership in the 2023 World Cup is 97
Shakib Al Hasan has been Bangladesh's most prolific wicket-taker against Pakistan in ODI history
Post-Match Reflections: Bangladesh are officially knocked out of the tournament
Pakistan stay alive and keep their hopes of a semi-finals spot
Pakistan's win probability was at 100% throughout the match
Miscellaneous Highlights: Over 500 children were hosted at Eden Gardens by the Cricket Association of Bengal
Pakistan have successfully chased a World Cup game with more than 105 balls remaining three times in history
